Articles.Content: so are you going to update the GAU 19?? That would be REALLY awesome if you did.

Well I have little to no coding knowledge so don't count on it /.\

If I did I would probably get some coding master to fix it and then make some new models (nose gun, wing gun, etc)

Well I have little to no coding knowledge so don't count on it /.\

aww i was rly hoping for a gun...

Well I have little to no coding knowledge so don't count on it /.\

If I did I would probably get some coding master to fix it and then make some new models (nose gun, wing gun, etc)

Hey Pirate, you could always just wait for my gun system. I won't be making lots of models for it. Just a few to cover off some of the base types. If you wanted to make models and use the plugin you wouldn't have to worry about the days and weeks of coding involved in making this work properly.

Right now I have a gun that can do some unheard of things... (ksp wise anyways) - some people are just going to freak when they see this I'm telling ya!
Finally! Up to Pirate but that sounds like a great idea.

how are the guns coming???

how are the guns coming???

There are videos in the BoatParts r3 thread(also some on youtube that didnt make the thread). Not only showing the guns, but also the damage system. Really cutting edge stuff ID & the boat team are doing. The naval weapons pack alone will be amazing, the damage system over the top!

Can you make stackable expolisives?

It would be usefull in that we would be able to make our own missiles,guided by the player.

Great plugin.

Tip(to the user):if you use the romfarer plugin to launch the rocket while controlling a plane with missile,you can have a great effect when you shoot the rocket!

Does this work with 20.2?
With PART{} (yes, it's case specific) tags wrapped around the .cfg then presumably yes it would work.
Question, Mr. Pirate, how can I give the nukes tracking ability? If they have it already, how can I turn it on?

Question, Mr. Pirate, how can I give the nukes tracking ability? If they have it already, how can I turn it on?

The way I would do it would be to just make the craft carrying the nukes ram into the target. That way, the nukes are just warheads.
Good point
Also, the faster the warhead, the harder it is to dodge.
Any words on if this is going to be updated? I would really like this for my A-10 model.
Any ETA on a .21.1 update?
When Its Done.
